item.description:
It's Memorial Day weekend and an extra day to recoop from one of the longer day hikes or stay overnight.

We have hikers who will be tenting on the trail Saturday - destination Bondcliff. Join in or form a sunrise hike.

Consult the White Mountain Guide for details and map.

RSVP as soon as possible to get your hiking group together. 10 hikers per group in the Wilderness areas. This will soon be reduced to 4 hikers by the parks department.

Post in your comments which hike you would like.



Lincoln Woods to Bondcliff Dennis P's group 8am
Totals
Distance 18.20 mi
Time 12 hr 32 min
Elev Gain +3765 ft
Elev Loss -3765 ft
Elev Change 0 ft


Zealand trailhead to Bondcliff Ogel's group
Totals
Distance 18.76 mi
Time 10 hr 56 min
Elev Gain +5363 ft
Elev Loss -5363 ft
Elev Change 0 ft
item.how_to_find_us: Contact each other for location and time. Post your final decision in comments.
item.name: Bondcliff
